BP Induction
path_descr: This course is intended to inform personnel about the work that BP does on the North Slope of Alaska. You will discuss the hazards that may be encountered in Prudhoe Bay and in the oil & gas industry in Alaska, emergency information, camps and facilities details, road and weather conditions, safe driving rules and much more. This course is required for all personnel working on BP sites and/or projects in Alaska.
